newThemeModal.title: New Theme
newThemeModal.description: Select the type of theme that matches the better with your project needs.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Opt for this option if you prefer a simplified approach without the need for Dark and Light mode variations. Your theme will maintain a consistent look and feel across all platforms and environments.

dual.title: Dual
dual.description: Opt for this option if you want your theme to adapt seamlessly to different system settings. With Dual Mode, your theme will offer both Dark and Light modes, providing users the flexibility to switch between them based on the system or their preferences.

home.description: CSS Theme Builder is an App made for designers and for developers, facilitating the creation of custom and dynamic themes by using CSS variables.

baseColorRamp.title: Base Color Ramp
baseColorRamp.description: Adjust the color ramp values and percentages to achieve the perfect contrast.
baseColorRamp.baseColorInfo: Color used to define the background color for your theme. If you want a clear theme, youb can use white or some light color.
baseColorRamp.contrastColorInfo: Color used to generate a high contrast with the base color. This is mostly used to define text and borders.
baseColorRamp.percentagesInfo: Amount of contrast for each step of the color ramp.
